string.value: #b#p2111005##k is the little Fairy who aspires to be an alchemist. Where will her studies and research take her next? I better check it out for myself!

#p2111005# told me she wanted to thoroughly check out the powerful #r#o7110300##k. I told her she must be really into alchemy, and #p2111005# said there's a reason for all this, and proceeded to ask me to get her #b1 #t4000362##k from #o7110300#. \n\n#i4000362##t4000362# #b#c4000362##k/1

#p2111005# told me the reason she had been studying so hard on these mechanical dolls is because of her friend #p2111003#. She wants to fulfill his wish to become a human being, and that's what's driving her into alchemy. Will #p2111005# be able to turn #p2111003# into a living, breathing human being?
Hey! You're that awesome traveler! Thanks to your help, I was able to master the mechanism of #o5110301# and #o5110302#. Thank you thank you, and thank you! \r\n#b#L0#Wow, you're really into this.#l
Huh? Hahaha of course! #p2111005# has a purpose for studying all this! Now that I said that... can you... help me out once more?

Wow! Really? Thank you so much! This is what I want: A #bBroken Mechanical Heart#k that #r#o7110300##k has. I know it's quite strong, so I didn't know what to do, but now that a powerful traveler like you offered to help... I can't help it, I am excited!
I see... well, since you helped me a number of times already... it'll be rude to ask for you for help again, right? Okay, I'll try to get it myself this time...

Did you find the broken mechanical heart? Wow... amazing! You have already helped me out more than once, and now this? The reason I have been able to come this far is all thanks to you! Thank you so much! This will really help my experiment!

Exploring mechanical dolls is not easy, but since you've worked so hard to get me all the materials, it is my turn to pay you back by really studying these babies. Then one of these days, I'll be able to fulfill #b#p2111003#'s wish#k, right?
#p2111003# is a mechanical doll. Unlike #o5110301#, which doesn't think, it's a mechanical doll that acts like a human being. #p2111003#, however, wants to become human.
#p2111003# is so kind and gentle. He's not human, but he seems like one... that's why... #p2111005# wants to do everything to help fulfill #p2111003#'s wish.

If you can get more #t4000362#s from #o7110300#, then please get as much as you can. Once I completely disassemble it and go through it, I'll need more of those to explore different sides of it. So if you find more #t4000362#s, then please bring them to me in 3 days. It takes 3 days to go through one heart, so AFTER 3 days!
You couldn't find #b#t4000362##k? #r#o7110300##k is very dangerous, so please be careful!
